content: this legal document summarizes the progress of a legal case involving the division of an estate the court assigns certain properties to the heirs including a flat a cellar room and a groundfloor premises various sums of money are also ordered to be paid to different parties the court takes into account the deaths of some heirs and the renouncement of others an expert appraises the properties and considers the exclusive occupation of certain buildings by specific heirs the court rejects certain requests and amendments to the division plan the court also addresses the issue of a private deed and the renouncement of claims by certain parties ultimately the court makes a final decision on the division of the estate and orders the payment of specific sums of money the court also addresses the issue of costs and decides to offset them the court of first instance has made a final ruling declaring that certain issues no longer exist and limiting the positions of the parties involved the court orders the dissolution of the community property and assigns specific properties to the heirs it also orders the payment of sums of money to the community and individual shareholders the court authorizes the transcription of the judgment and declares that the litigation costs have been fully compensated the judgment is provisionally enforceable and was made on april 2 2018
